subject: IKEA Industry
more-info: concluding this process at the end of March 2023

subject: Ikea
object: each item of the tangible fixed assets
more-info: Depreciation starts as soon as the asset is available for its intended use, and is recognised in the profit and loss account on a straight-line basis over the estimated useful lives of each item.

subject: Ikea
object: expenditure that extends the useful life of the asset
more-info: Expenditure is only capitalised when it extends the useful life of the asset.

subject: Ikea
object: the component approach for tangible fixed assets
